Articles.Content:
I have found a very interesting bug that has completely stopped me from being able to use the game, at all. I do not know how or why it has occurred, but sometime in the recent past I have done something that has caused me to lose almost total functionality on my mouse and keyboard while in game. I first noticed it when I started the game up this morning to play and noticed that while in the VAB my ability to control the camera via the right mouse button or scroll wheel has completely been lost. I cannot move the camera at all no matter what screen I am on. It does not matter if I click on a facility, if I load a vehicle to launch, or if I am just sitting at the main KSC screen. I cannot move the camera at all. I can still click on objects to put them on my ship, or navigate menus by clicking on the appropriate on screen icon, but beyond that, nothing else appears to work. I have also lost almost all keyboard functionality. None of the hotkeys work in the build facilities, nor does the ESC menu come up when I hit the button.

Since I do normally run a HEAVILY modded game I first thought one had become corrupted or something. I am not sure how, since I have not changed or up dated anything in the recent past. And yes, this is very much a situation of it was working when I logged off it last night and it no longer works in the morning. In spite of that, just to be sure, I did a complete removal of the game and all associated folders and re-installed a base "vanilla" game. The problem remains.

Some information to help, I hope.
